Time Zone: Before you continue to your store, please make a note of your encryption key (Magento uses it to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more).

Time Zone: For HTTP connections, the default port is 80.
(Make sure you keep it in a safe place.)
Magento uses this key to encrypt passwords, credit cards and more. If this field is left empty the system will create an encription key for you and will display it on the next page.
Tidszone: Magento bruger denne nøgle til at kryptere kodeord, kreditkort-informationer osv. Hvis dette felt ikke udfyldes, så vil systemet generere en krypteringsnøgle for dig. Denne vil blive vist på næste side.
